title: Paint it Black
description: Red Blood, Black NightVampire and vampire-hunter Sonja Blue has faced many monsters, but none compare to the Other, the demonic alter ego inside her. Now, as her world grows darker still, her vampiric “grandfather” Pangloss returns. Could he show her the way to redemption? Or is he here simply to drive her further into the abyss?About the AuthorNancy A. Collins is the author of Sunglasses After Dark™, Darkest Heart™ and Dead Roses for a Blue Lady™. She is a past recipient of the Bram Stoker and British Fantasy Iecarus Awards, and a nominee for the 2003 Stoker and International Horror Guild Awards.
author: Nancy A. Collins
